Package com.safetynet.alerts.controller

Class CrossModelController

java.lang.Object
com.safetynet.alerts.controller.CrossModelController
@RestController public class CrossModelController extends Object
A class that receives requests made from specific URLs that are independent of the CRUD endpoints.
Version:
1.0
Author:
SÃ©bastien Cappon
Singularity :
Responses are filtered using JsonView to match the response pattern desired by the client.

    A GetMapping method on the /communityEmail URI which calls the eponymous ICrossModelService method and returns the list of email addresses of all the city residents with status code 200.

  • Method Details

    • getPersonsCoveredByFirestation

      @GetMapping("/firestation") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<FirestationScope> getPersonsCoveredByFirestation(@RequestParam Long stationNumber)
      A GetMapping method on the /firestation URI which calls the eponymous ICrossModelService method and returns a FirestationScope (DTO) with status code 200. If the result is empty, it returns status code 204.
      Returns:
      FirestationScope (DTO) and a status code.
      Jackson JSON View filters :
      Display first name, last name, address and phone number.

    • getChildrenFromAddress

      @GetMapping("/childAlert") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Child>> getChildrenFromAddress(@RequestParam String address)
      A GetMapping method on the /childAlert URI which calls the eponymous ICrossModelService method and returns a Child (DTO) list with status code 200. If the result is empty, it returns status code 204.
      Returns:
      Child (DTO) list and a status code.
      Jackson JSON View filters :
      Display first name, last name and age.

    • getPhoneNumberFromPersonsCoveredByFirestation

      @GetMapping("/phoneAlert") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<String>> getPhoneNumberFromPersonsCoveredByFirestation(@RequestParam Long firestation)
      A GetMapping method on the /phoneAlert URI which calls the eponymous ICrossModelService method and returns a list of phone numbers with status code 200. If the result is empty, it returns status code 204.
      Returns:
      String list of phone numbers and a status code.

    • getPersonsAndFirestationFromAddress

      @GetMapping("/fire") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Household> getPersonsAndFirestationFromAddress(@RequestParam String address)
      A GetMapping method on the /fire URI which calls the eponymous ICrossModelService method and returns a Household (DTO) with status code 200. If the result is empty, it returns status code 204.
      Returns:
      Household (DTO) and a status code.
      Jackson JSON View filters :
      Display household, station number and station address.

    • getHouseholdsCoveredByFirestations

      @GetMapping("/flood/stations") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<Long,Map<String,Household>>> getHouseholdsCoveredByFirestations(@RequestParam List<Long> stations)
      A GetMapping method on the /flood/stations URI which calls the eponymous ICrossModelService method and returns a list of all the Household sorted by addresses covered by stations. with status code 200. If the result is empty, it returns status code 204.
      Returns:
      TreeMap of Long and TreeMap of TreeMap Long and Household (DTO) and a status code.
      Jackson JSON View filters :
      Display first name, last name, phone, age, medications and allergies.

    • getPersonsInfoByFirstNameAndLastName

      @GetMapping("/personInfo") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Person>> getPersonsInfoByFirstNameAndLastName(@RequestParam String firstName, @RequestParam String lastName)
      A GetMapping method on the /personInfo URI which calls the eponymous ICrossModelService method and returns a Person (DTO) list with status code 200. If the result is empty, it returns status code 204.
      Returns:
      Person (DTO) list and a status code.
      Jackson JSON View filters :
      Display first name, last name, address, email, age, medications and allergies.

    • getEmailsFromCityResidents

      @GetMapping("/communityEmail") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<String>> getEmailsFromCityResidents(@RequestParam String city)
      A GetMapping method on the /communityEmail URI which calls the eponymous ICrossModelService method and returns the list of email addresses of all the city residents with status code 200. If the result is empty, it returns status code 204.
      Returns:
      String list and a status code.
